name: Baduku
overview:
Baduku is an opinion engine that helps people make informed decisions or gauge public opinions about anything. Unlike other review sites that are just a collection of individual opinions presented separately, Baduku offers organization of opinions that merges the opinions of all users and ranks them by order of consensus.

The best way of describing it is that rather than having to read hundreds of individual reviews to get the whole picture about a topic.

Baduku is scheduled to launch on January 15, 2010.
